page.title: 19REDDISH IN THE PAST
page.content: In the past there were very few streets in Reddish;most of the land was covered in fields.There were many mills;Gregs ,Nickson and Houldsworth.There was Nelstrop7s flour mill ,Scott's wire works and the chemical works.At the back of the mills were warm ponds where people went swimming(the machinery heated the water).A canal ran through Reddish which led to Manchester Docks. Itwas apoor area where agreat deal ofpeople hadto work ta jobs which could cause illness or even death. In school there were strict rules if you didn't obey them you would get the cane.
